sections.title: Making Grammar Inclusive
sections.subtitle: Factoring in a Non-Binary Voice in the Continuous/Progressive Aspect

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Factoring in a ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"non-binary voice","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" in the Continuous/Progressive aspect","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"In Hindi, the Continuous or Progressive aspect is usually used to talk about on-going actions, whether present or past. These are equivalent to the English, “I am coming”, “I am seeing”, “I am conquering”, “I was coming”, “I was seeing”, “I was conquering”.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"To see how the continuous or progressive aspect works with the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"non-binary voice ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"proposed by the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Making Hindi Grammar Inclusive","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" project, check out the links below. Please feel free to download and use any of the following files with or without transliterations in both, pdf and pages format:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"7KiQoDZG2IxnbOUDukaCbI","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4SImW46pi9mJI3HGaAWZJC","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"73CKC8CiXLwwZZXV30NTj3","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block","data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"2n7RqGQdpYKll6EUtTx9c3","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
